getBorrowValue(DnGmxJuniorVaultHelpers.S.details: returns the borrow value in USDC

rebalanceHedge(DnGmxJuniorVaultHelpers.S.details: to be called after settle profits only (since vaultMarketValue if after settlement of profits)

params.currentBtcBorrow: The amount of USDC collateral token deposited to LB Protocol
params.currentEthBorrow: The market value of ETH/BTC part in sGLP
